brand.name: (FR) Brand
brand.help: (FR) The brand is the product's manufacturer, whose name can usually be found on the front of the camera or lens.

model.name: (FR) Model
model.help: (FR) Camera bodies usually state their model on the front. For lenses you can enter all the text written around the front lens.
model.placeholder: (FR) D800, 5D Mark III, 50mm f1.4 AF, SB-900 flash, ...

condition.name: (FR) Condition
condition.help: (FR) What condition is the product in?

options.perfect: (FR) Perfect – The product works without flaws.
options.useable: (FR) Good – The product has been used, but works as intended.
options.broken: (FR) Broken – The product is mainly for spare parts.

images.name: (FR) Images
images.help: (FR) Add images of your product to help us make a better offer.
